paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from the study.

patients.demographics: female, Australian women diagnosed with breast cancer before 40 years of age

functional_data.summary: The variant c.1342A>C in BRCA2 was found to occur less frequently in deleterious mutation carriers.

variants.evidence_level: weak evidence for difference in distribution
variants.additional_notes: The evidence for difference in the distribution between carriers and non-carriers was weak (p = 0.16).
key_quotes: a common genetic variant in BRCA2 (1342A > C) occurred less frequently in deleterious mutation carriers (p = 0.04).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
